availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mariah Holton Luckett (Franklin County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Benjamin J. Luckett in Franklin County, Kentucky, on June 16, 1814. Mother of Mary E. Luckett, Monarcha E. Luckett, Mary E. Luckett, and Anne Fenwick Luckett. Resident of Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned ten enslaved persons in 1850. Household owned Ben [Unknown] in Franklin County in 1855. Household owned Tom [Unknown] in Franklin County in 1859. Resident of Frankfort, Franklin County, in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Frankfort in 1860.

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2.

Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994034, Franklin County Deaths.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 4010.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Franklin County Marriages, Film 000266192.
